formattedAddress: 5 Tudor City Pl FRNT 4, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 5 Tudor City Pl FRNT 4, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
Sometimes I’ll drop off a package here and it will start tracking the next day — other times I’ve had significant delays that have caused me major concern. A package that wasn’t scanned in until 1-2 weeks after drop off…

Update:
I’ve used this location many times since, I didn’t have any noticeable problems until now again. Dropped a small package off on a Tuesday and it’s now Monday of the following week and still the package has not been scanned in. This is most definitely problematic.

originalText.text: Kiosk was working and easy to use. Drop box wasn’t full, package went right in. Just hoping they actually check the drop box daily and will pickup my outgoing package today....UPDATE, my package made it to it’s destination. Happy with the timing.

text.text: Kiosk was working and easy to use. Drop box wasn’t full, package went right in. Just hoping they actually check the drop box daily and will pickup my outgoing package today....UPDATE, my package made it to it’s destination. Happy with the timing.

originalText.text:
this location is not checked often. very slow and delayed. extremely annoying. i put something in this mailbox on the 27th of january, it still hasn't been picked up as of the 31st???? what is the point in paying for priority mail? unacceptable.

UPDATE:
location is still not checked often..called many times to complain. nobody cares.

originalText.text: Kiosk was not working. Difficult to find. Suggestion: walk to 2nd and 41st then make a right. It's its own door to the right of the residence entrance.

originalText.text: Only the self serve kiosk is open. Not customer service. It wouldn't be so bad if the drop off bin WASN'T FULL. What's the point of being open?
